ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: Learned new repertoire and performance skills
Voice lessons - refined vocal technique, worked on improving expressibility, and interpretation of text.
I learned so so much about the voice!
I learned about various performance and technical skills. I also learned ways to interpret the repertoire.
very high-caliber teaching in violin performance
I truly honed my skills as a singer this semester, and increased my exposure to classical songs from a variety of regions and time periods.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments:
Strengths: studio classes, weekly lessons, amazing professors
No weaknesses

The course is highly individualized, which allows me to grow a lot by targeting what I need to work on most. I like the flexibility that comes with lessons, so I am always interested in the material. Studio class gave me essential performance experience. I wish I got a bit more feedback, but the course is overall very rewarding.
Strengths: one-on-one teaching at a high level

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: Id recommend this program to anyone seeking to seriously improve their musical abilities with respect to a specific instrument.
Absolutely, its always one of my favorite classes of the semester
I would recommend this course if you play an instrument. I learned a lot of skills with the repertoire I was learning.
Yes!  Violin lessons are always great to have.
Yes! If they are interested in violin performance
Yes! I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to improve their singing. Lessons are awesome!
